titleInfo.title: Gene Autry's Melody Ranch - 1949-01-08 - Part 1 -- Hillbilly Hit Parade - 1949-01-08 (excerpt)

mods.abstract: Gene Autry's Melody Ranch, originally broadcast 1949-01-08 (part 1) over the CBS network. Featuring Gene Autry, Johnny Bond, Pat Buttram, the Cass County Boys, the Pinafores, Carl Cotner, with announcer Lou Crosby. Sponsored by Wrigley's Gum. Recording begins with an excerpt of KRLD (Fort Worth, TX) program Hillbilly Hit Parade, 1949-01-06, with host 'Johnny'. In this excerpt, Gene Autry announces he is to appear in Dallas, TX 'next Monday' (presumably 1949-01-09).
